content.question: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral of open parentheses x squared plus 1 close parentheses squared with respect to x equals"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbiqaaWKgqaaaaa aaaaWdbmaapeaapaqaa8qacaGGOaGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qa caaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGymaiaacMcapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaG OmaaaaaeqabeqdcqGHRiI8aOGaamizaiaadIhacqGH9aqpaaa@4191@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="open parentheses x squared plus 1 close parentheses cubed divided by 3 plus C"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaiikaiaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOm aaaakiabgUcaRiaaigdacaGGPaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaiodaaa aak8aabaWdbiaaiodaaaGaey4kaSIaam4qaaaa@3EE3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="open parentheses x squared plus 1 close parentheses cubed divided by open parentheses 6 times x close parentheses plus C"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaiikaiaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOm aaaakiabgUcaRiaaigdacaGGPaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaiodaaa aak8aabaWdbiaaiAdacaWG4baaaiabgUcaRiaadoeaaaa@3FE3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="open parentheses x cubed divided by 3 plus x close parentheses squared plus C"> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGOaWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaG4m aaaaaOWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaacqGHRaWkcaWG4bGaaiyka8aadaahaa Wcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaam4qaaaa@3F25@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="2 times x times open parentheses x squared plus 1 close parentheses cubed divided by 3 plus C"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaadIhacaGGOaGaamiEa8aadaahaaWc beqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGymaiaacMcapaWaaWbaaSqabe aapeGaaG4maaaaaOWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaacqGHRaWkcaWGdbaaaa@409C@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x to the power of 5 divided by 5 plus 2 times x cubed divided by 3 plus x plus C"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>5</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaI1aaaaaGc paqaa8qacaaI1aaaaiabgUcaRmaalaaapaqaa8qacaaIYaGaamiEa8 aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaGcpaqaa8qacaaIZaaaaiabgUca RiaadIhacqGHRaWkcaWGdbaaaa@4177@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 6.8: Finding Antiderivatives and Indefinite Integrals - Basic Rules and Notation

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
